trans-unit.source: Defines the instance of of a peer node used by an application participating in a specific peer mesh.
trans-unit.target: Definerer forekomsten av av en node-node som brukes av et program som deltar i et bestemt node nett.

trans-unit.source: A peer node can host multiple peer channels within the mesh as long as they share a common URI and host name in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> supplied to the binding for each channel.
trans-unit.target: En node-node kan være vert for flere node kanaler i nettet så lenge de har et URI og et vertsnavn Fellesnavn i den <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>levert til bindingen for hver kanal.</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: If two or more peer channels defined for a peer node are created with separate bindings, then the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.Port%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.ListenIPAddress%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.Resolver%2A> properties must be identical on all bindings.
trans-unit.target: Hvis to eller flere node kanaler som er definert for en node-noden er opprettet med separate bindinger vil <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.Port%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.ListenIPAddress%2A>, og <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.Resolver%2A>Egenskaper må være identiske på alle bindinger.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.Resolver%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.ListenIPAddress%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.Port%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a subsequent channel binding is created after the first one for the same peer node instance, then the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.MaxReceivedMessageSize%2A> property on this and subsequent bindings must be less than or equal to the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.MaxReceivedMessageSize%2A> property as set on the first channel binding.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en etterfølgende kanal binding opprettes etter for samme node noden forekomsten, og deretter den <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.MaxReceivedMessageSize%2A>egenskapen i denne og etterfølgende bindinger må være mindre enn eller lik verdien for <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.MaxReceivedMessageSize%2A>egenskap som er angitt i den første kanal bindingen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.MaxReceivedMessageSize%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.NetPeerTcpBinding.MaxReceivedMessageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the peer node is online and able to send messages to neighboring nodes in the peer mesh.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om node-noden er tilkoblet og sende meldinger til nodene på nettet node.

trans-unit.source: "Online" indicates that a peer node has available neighbor nodes.
trans-unit.target: "Online" angir at en node har tilgjengelige nabo noder.

trans-unit.source: "Offline" indicates that a peer node has no available neighbors.
trans-unit.target: "Frakoblet" indikerer at en node har ingen tilgjengelige naboer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the peer node is online; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den node-noden er tilkoblet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a custom filter for messages received over the peer channel.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et egendefinert filter for meldinger som ble mottatt over node-kanal.

trans-unit.source: The message filter must be a derived type and should be recast to that type to use any custom features defined on it.
trans-unit.target: Meldingsfilteret må være en avledet type, og må recast til denne typen skal bruke egendefinerte definert.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerMessagePropagationFilter"></xref> that contains a custom message filter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerMessagePropagationFilter"></xref>som inneholder et filter for egendefinert melding.

trans-unit.source: No channel is open for listening.
trans-unit.target: Ingen kanal er åpen for lytting.

trans-unit.source: Signals when the peer node goes offline from the peer mesh.
trans-unit.target: Signaler når noden node kobles fra fra motparten nett.

trans-unit.source: An offline peer node has no neighbor nodes within the peer mesh to which it can connect.
trans-unit.target: En frakoblet node har ingen nabo noder i node-nettet som den kan kobles til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Signals when a peer node comes online within the peer mesh.
trans-unit.target: Signaliserer når en node-node kommer online i node-nettet.

trans-unit.source: An online peer node has at least one neighbor node within the peer mesh to which it is connected.
trans-unit.target: En tilkoblet node har minst én nabo-noden i node-nettet den er koblet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the network port on which the peer node is listening.
trans-unit.target: Henter nettverksporten noden node lytter.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the network port on which the peer node is listening.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>som angir nettverksporten noden node lytter.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: No channel is open for listening.
trans-unit.target: Ingen kanal er åpen for lytting.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the connection with the peer mesh.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer tilkoblingen node nettet.

trans-unit.source: No channel is open for listening.
trans-unit.target: Ingen kanal er åpen for lytting.

trans-unit.source: The refresh operation timed out.
trans-unit.target: Oppdateringsoperasjonen ble tidsavbrutt.

trans-unit.source: A network error occurred during the refresh attempt.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en nettverksfeil under forsøket på oppdatering.

trans-unit.source: The connection aborted during the refresh attempt.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen ble avbrutt under forsøk på oppdatering.

trans-unit.source: The connection faulted during the refresh attempt.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen mislyktes under forsøk på oppdatering.

trans-unit.source: Provides a string representation of a peer node.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en strengrepresentasjon av en node-node.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> value that contains the mesh ID of the peer node if the mesh ID is set; otherwise, it returns the type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>verdien som inneholder nett ID noden node Hvis nett-ID er angitt; Hvis ikke, returneres typen.</xref:System.String>
